Class RuleManagerBaseXImpl

java.lang.Object
  TheRuler.Model.RuleManagerBaseXImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
RuleManager
public class RuleManagerBaseXImpl
extends Object
implements RuleManager

Database manager for rules, which works with BaseX XML database.

Author:
Peter Gren
